When using EB-rMAP prior with a time-to-event endpoint, one important step is to estimate the total exposure in the current trial. The [*simtrial*](https://merck.github.io/simtrial/index.html) package is one helpful tool for this purpose. We demonstrate the steps in this vignette.  

```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(simtrial)
library(knitr)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
```
